objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#2B2B2B'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#121212'/></linearGradient></defs><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.15'/><defs><radialGradient id='grad2' cx='0.5' cy='0.5' r='0.5' fx='0.5' fy='0.5'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#CCCCCC'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#121212'/></radialGradient></defs><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0 400 C200 380 400 420 600 400 C800 380 1000 420 1080 400 L1080 1080 L0 1080 L0 400Z' fill='#101010' opacity='0.7'/></svg>

product_details.description: A provocative fragrance that exudes confidence, sensuality, and sophistication. Crisp top notes of bergamot, lavandin, cinnamon, and apple create an invigorating introduction. Middle notes of muguet and orange blossom add depth and elegance to the composition. A blend of patchouli, amber, vanilla, and tonka bean provides a refined and lasting finish. A timeless scent ideal for making a bold and unforgettable impression. Brand - Afnan ** Item Form - Liquid ** Item Volume - 100 Milliliters ** Scent - 9 PM ** Special Feature - Long Lasting **

banner_details:
The banner features a dark, elegant design with a sophisticated gradient background formed from deep greys (#121212 to #2B2B2B), enhanced by smooth, flowing wave patterns and subtle radial gradients that bring focus to the center. It prominently displays a perfume bottle image ("product_image") centered in the composition to draw attention. At the top, a bold, futuristic header ("heading") captures attention with all-caps text in white. Just below it, the subheading ("subheading") uses a soft grey tone to complement the main title. At the bottom, supporting product details are provided through the "description" text layer, followed by a bold price ("price") and a centered call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") inviting the user to shop. The fonts are modern and visually matching the masculine theme. The layout maintains clarity and balance through centered alignment and strategic spacing.

**Color palette**:  
- Very dark grey: #121212  
- Charcoal grey: #2B2B2B  
- Light grey: #CCCCCC  
- Medium grey: #A0A0A0  
- Button grey: #616161  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern design with a dominant black and silver color scheme, evoking elegance and luxury. The black background (#000000) provides a strong contrast, making the large white typography (#FFFFFF) pop, emphasizing the brand’s minimalist yet sophisticated appeal. The metallic silver cap (#C0C0C0) adds an element of shine and prestige, blending smoothly with the transparent glass edges that reflect hints of gray (#A9A9A9). These colors harmoniously merge yet retain their individuality, creating a bold impression. For an advertisement banner, using this palette will ensure consistency and elegance: Black (#000000), White (#FFFFFF), Silver (#C0C0C0), Dark Gray (#A9A9A9).
